data.actual_result: The numbers are higher and the hashtag lower a little, compared to 100% zoom
data.expected_result: The hashtag and numbers are still centered

data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Go to My Account - Click Edit - Observe the numbers and the hashtag
